item.description: Test first post to the platform
Test second post to the platform

item.title: Finally, a blog.
item.description: 09-10-2023 Every time I’ve attempted to blog in the past it’s only ended in two or three posts, and then me getting frusted with managing wordpress and it’s awful ecosystem instead of getting my thoughts out. Hopefully this ends up in better results. Using Hugo with the PaperMod theme, it appears to offer a pretty clean look and very low impact. Hugo[^1]: https://gohugo.io/getting-started/quick-start/ PaperMod Theme[^2]: https://github.com/adityatelange/hugo-PaperMod Markdown Reference[^3]: https://docs.github.com/en/get-started/writing-on-github/getting-started-with-writing-and-formatting-on-github/basic-writing-and-formatting-syntax
